exceptions.tactic: intros K a u n m.
intros K' a u n m.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of mult_zero_l (mult zero _) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment K : Ring a : K u : nat -> K m : nat Unable to unify "mult a (iter_nat plus zero u 0 m)" with "iter_nat plus zero (fun k : nat => mult a (u k)) 0 m".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros K a u n m. unfold sum_n_m. induction n. - simpl. rewrite mult_zero_l. reflexivity. - simpl.
